name: freeboard-react-widget
description: A starter template for building freeboard widgets using react.

scripts.dashboard: cat ../freeboard/dashboard.json | freeboard-react-buildtool > temp && cp temp ../freeboard/dashboard.json && rm temp
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run dashboard
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec npm run build --watch code.jsx --watch data.js
scripts.watch-dev: nodemon --exec npm run dev --watch code.jsx --watch data.js

author: jritsema
